summary: This mod replaces the Blades\' Akaviri-Katana by a japanese Ninjato-Sword;
descriptionHtml:
Name: Ninjato Anei 4 Skyrim
( http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=6746 )
Version: 2.2
Date: 05-18-2012
Category: Weapons
Requirements: Skyrim
Author: Humannature66

[URL=http://www.ld-host.de/][IMG]http://www.ld-host.de/uploads/images/0210fddcc7038e429083edc1bf634baf.jpg[/IMG][/URL]


... DESCRIPTION ...

Version 2.2
===========
the swords can be crafted now;


This is what you get:
=====================
This mod adds a japanese Ninjato-Sword called \"Anei\" to your game;

- A short & straight blade, a square Tsuba (handguard) and detailed Tsuka (handle).
- A blade of polished & real shiny steel.
- A visible Hamon (TemperLine).
- No Saya (scabbard).



How you can get them:
=====================
You find two of the Ninjatos in the chest in your player\'s home in Whiterun, Solitude and so on.
Also you can craft it by smithing like all other swords.



Install of this mod
===================

1. Extract the files to a temporary location.

2. create the required folder structure, as you find it in this mod-pack.

3. Copy the contents into the designated folders:


>> the esp <<
...data\\Ninjato Anei Unique.esp

>> the meshes <<
...data\\meshes\\weapons\\HN66\\Ninjato Anei\\1stpersonNinjatoAnei.nif
...data\\meshes\\weapons\\HN66\\Ninjato Anei\\NinjatoAnei.nif
...data\\meshes\\weapons\\HN66\\Ninjato Anei\\fxdragonsbaneswordstreak.nif

>> the textures <<
...data\\textures\\HN66\\Ninjato Anei\\Ninjato black-8.dds
...data\\textures\\HN66\\Ninjato Anei\\Ninjato black-8_n.dds
...data\\textures\\HN66\\Ninjato Anei\\Ninjato black-8_m.dds
...data\\textures\\cubemaps\\shinycontrast_e.dds


>>>it is important to use EXACTLY the same folder-structure as it is given in the mod-pack !!!<<<
>>>any little mistake in path or a misspelled foldername will result in a non-working mod !!!<<<

4. enjoy.



Uninstall
=========
1. Delete the folders associated with the mod.



Incompatibility
===============
none that i know of;


Known Issues or Bugs
====================
none that i know of;


Contact
=======
You can find me on the nexusforums, newvegasnexus & skyrimnexus as Humannature66;

*********************************************************************************
*********************************************************************************

___________________________________________________________________________

if you like this mod: use & enjoy it, or maybe u like to give a kudos;
___________________________________________________________________________

if u need technical help with this: contact me via pm;
___________________________________________________________________________

===============

(http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=3790)

Jinxxed0 for the hint, that i had forgotten to make them craftable (typical me ... *sigh*);

*********************************************************************************

*********************************************************************************

==========
NIFSkope - http://www.niftools.org/
Blender - http://www.blender.org/
DXTBmp - http://www.softpedia.com
Photofiltre - http://photofiltre.softonic.de/
Gimp - http://www.gimp.org/
SkyEdit - https://github.com/uesp/skyedit

greetz freddo / Humannature66
